attributes.action: Charge cyclists road tax and introduce a bicycle license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists have had numerous lanes built for them this has been paid for by the motorist, it is time they paid for the lanes they use.
it is also time that cyclists are made to have a vehicle license, as many have no idea whatsoever of the dangers of the road and frequently commit acts of gross negligence that in a car or on a motorbike would result in a fine or prison.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
